response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $9,500. This represents a significant savings compared to the market value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and align with your financial considerations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
